subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen’s 3-pointer with 1:20 left gave Boston its first lead since the opening minutes and the Celtics beat the Orlando Magic to take a 3-2 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinals.
snippet: Ray Allen’s 3-pointer with 1:20 left gave Boston its first lead since the opening minutes and the Celtics beat the Orlando Magic to take a 3-2 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinals.
